languages.text: Шанс успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку равен (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} цели + ее {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}парированию{/g} − (Ближний Бой атакующего + снижение парирования))%. Если при этом рядом с целью или атакующим персонажем находится союзник с рукопашным оружием, используется правило превосходства в ближнем бою, которое дает 1) +10 Ближнего Боя атакующему за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с целью 2) +10 Ближнего Боя цели за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с атакующим Базовый шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от такой атаки равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и эффектов, дающих бонусы или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не смогла уклониться от атаки или парировать ее. Атаки рукопашным оружием по области совершаются так же, как и одиночные, но {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} против каждой цели в зоне поражения совершаются отдельно. Урон от атак по области получают все цели в зоне поражения — как союзники, так и противники.
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: В ближнем бою цель пытается уклониться от атаки по {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}правилам уклонения{/g}. Независимо от результата этой проверки, сразу после нее цель пытается парировать атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Чем больше разница между значениями характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} атакующего и его цели, тем меньше шанса у цели парировать атаку. Шанс успешного парирования равен (2 × (Ближний Бой цели + ее бонусы к парированию − (Ближний Бой атакующего + снижение парирования)))%. Если при этом рядом с целью или атакующим персонажем находится союзник с рукопашным оружием, используется правило превосходства в ближнем бою, которое дает: 1) +10 Ближнего Боя атакующему за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с целью 2) +10 Ближнего Боя цели за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с атакующим Базовый шанс уклониться от такой атаки равен (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Значение этого показателя также может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, а также в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}cнижение уклонения{/g} используемого оружия. Цель получает урон, если не смогла уклониться от атаки или парировать ее. Атаки рукопашным оружием по области совершаются так же, как и одиночные, но проверки против каждой цели в зоне поражения совершаются отдельно. Урон от атак по области получают все цели в зоне поражения — как союзники, так и противники.

В ближнем бою цель пытается уклониться от атаки по {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}правилам уклонения{/g}. Независимо от результата этой проверки, сразу после нее цель пытается парировать атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Чем больше разница между значениями характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} атакующего и его цели, тем меньше шанса у цели парировать атаку. Шанс успешного парирования равен (2 × (Ближний Бой цели + ее бонусы к парированию − (Ближний Бой атакующего + снижение парирования)))%. Если при этом рядом с целью или атакующим персонажем находится союзник с рукопашным оружием, используется правило превосходства в ближнем бою, которое дает: 1) +10 Ближнего Боя атакующему за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с целью 2) +10 Ближнего Боя цели за каждого союзника с рукопашным оружием рядом с атакующим Базовый шанс уклониться от такой атаки равен (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Значение этого показателя также может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, а также в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}cнижение уклонения{/g} используемого оружия. Цель получает урон, если не смогла уклониться от атаки или парировать ее. Атаки рукопашным оружием по области совершаются так же, как и одиночные, но проверки против каждой цели в зоне поражения совершаются отдельно. Урон от атак по области получают все цели в зоне поражения — как союзники, так и противники.

languages.text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и эффектов, дающих бонусы или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не смогла уклониться от атаки или парировать ее. Атаки рукопашным оружием по области совершаются так же, как и одиночные, но {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} против каждой цели в зоне поражения совершаются отдельно. Урон от атак по области получают все цели в зоне поражения — как союзники, так и противники.

traits.locale_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} − (attacker's Agility / 2))%. This value can also change depending on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that influence dodge chance and also depends on the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} parameter of the weapon used. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

languages.text: Die Chance zum erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} beträgt (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} + Parieren-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} des Ziels − (Waffenfähigkeit + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)) %. Sollte sich ein Verbündeter mit einer Nahkampfwaffe in der Nähe des Ziels oder des angreifenden Charakters befinden, wird {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g} aktiviert, was folgende Effekte hat: 1) +10 auf die Waffenfähigkeit des Angreifers für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Ziels befindet. 2) +10 auf die Waffenfähigkeit des Ziels für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Angreifers befindet. Die Basis-Chance, einem solchen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}, beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers) %. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen Bonus bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Das Ziel nimmt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wenn es dem Angriff nicht ausweichen oder ihn parieren kann. Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} laufen wie Einzelzielangriffe ab, wobei aber separate {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} für jedes Ziel im betroffenen Gebiet durchgeführt werden. Der Schaden durch Flächenangriffe wird allen Zielen im betroffenen Gebiet zugefügt, Verbündeten ebenso wie Feinden.
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: Die Chance zum erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} ist (2× (Ziel-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} + Parieren-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} − (Angreifer-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}))) %. Sollte sich ein Verbündeter mit einer Nahkampfwaffe in der Nähe des Ziels oder des angreifenden Charakters befinden, wird {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g} aktiviert, was folgende Effekte hat: 1) +10 auf die Waffenfertigkeit für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Ziels befindet 2) +10 auf die Waffenfertigkeit des Ziels, und zwar für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Angreifers befindet. Die Grundchance, einem solchen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen{/g}, ist (10 + Ziel-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} − Angreifer-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} %. Dieser Wert kann sich auch abhängend von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und Effekten verändern, die Einfluss auf die Ausweichen-Chance haben. Darüber hinaus hängt er auch vom Parameter {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} der eingesetzten Waffe ab. Das Ziel nimmt Schaden, wenn es dem Angriff nicht ausweichen oder ihn parieren kann. Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} laufen wie Einzelzielangriffe ab, wobei aber separate {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} für jedes Ziel im betroffenen Gebiet durchgeführt werden. Der durch Flächenangriffe zugefügte Schaden betrifft Verbündete und Feinde im betroffenen Gebiet.

Die Chance zum erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} beträgt (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} + Parieren-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} des Ziels — (Waffenfähigkeit + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)) %. Sollte sich ein Verbündeter mit einer Nahkampfwaffe in der Nähe des Ziels oder des angreifenden Charakters befinden, wird {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g} aktiviert, was folgende Effekte hat: 1) +10 auf die Waffenfähigkeit des Angreifers für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Ziels befindet. 2) +10 auf die Waffenfähigkeit des Ziels für jeden Verbündeten mit einer Nahkampfwaffe, der sich in der Nähe des Angreifers befindet. Die Basis-Chance, einem solchen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}, beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers) %. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen Bonus bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Das Ziel nimmt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wenn es dem Angriff nicht ausweichen oder ihn parieren kann. Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} laufen wie Einzelzielangriffe ab, wobei aber separate {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} für jedes Ziel im betroffenen Gebiet durchgeführt werden. Der Schaden durch Flächenangriffe wird allen Zielen im betroffenen Gebiet zugefügt, Verbündeten ebenso wie Feinden.

languages.text: Les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} sont de (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Parade de la cible − (Capacité de combat + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g} de l'attaquant)) %. Si un allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée se trouve à proximité de la cible ou du personnage qui attaque, la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g} est activée et confère : 1) +10 à la Capacité de combat de l'attaquant pour chaque allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de la cible. 2) +10 à la Capacité de combat de la cible pour chaque allié disposant d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de l'attaquant. Les chances de base d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} une telle attaque sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction de l'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et des effets appliquant des bonus ou des pénalités à l'Esquive de la cible ou à la Réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à esquiver ou parer l'attaque. Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} en mêlée sont effectuées de la même manière que les attaques à cible unique, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} contre chaque cible de la zone concernée sont effectués séparément. Les attaques de zone infligent des dégâts à toutes les cibles de la zone affectée, qu'il s'agisse d'alliés ou d'ennemis.
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: Les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} sont de (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Parade de la cible − (Capacité de combat + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g} de l'attaquant)) %. Si un allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée se trouve à proximité de la cible ou du personnage qui attaque, la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g} est activée et confère : 1) +10 à la Capacité de combat de l'attaquant pour chaque allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de la cible. 2) +10 à la Capacité de combat de la cible pour chaque allié disposant d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de l'attaquant. Les chances de base d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} une telle attaque sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction de l'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et des effets appliquant des bonus ou des pénalités à l'Esquive de la cible ou à la Réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à esquiver ou parer l'attaque. Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} en mêlée sont effectuées de la même manière que les attaques à cible unique, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} contre chaque cible de la zone concernée sont effectués séparément. Les attaques de zone infligent des dégâts à toutes les cibles de la zone affectée, qu'il s'agisse d'alliés ou d'ennemis.

Les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} sont de (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Parade de la cible − (Compétence d'arme + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g} de l’attaquant)) %. Si un allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée se trouve à proximité de la cible ou du personnage qui attaque, la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g} est activée et confère : 1) +10 à la Compétence d'arme de l'attaquant pour chaque allié équipé d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de la cible. 2) +10 à la Compétence d'arme de la cible pour chaque allié disposant d'une arme de mêlée à proximité de l'attaquant. Les chances de base d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} une telle attaque sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction de l'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et des effets appliquant des bonus ou des pénalités à l'Esquive de la cible ou à la Réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à esquiver ou parer l'attaque. Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} en mêlée sont effectuées de la même manière que les attaques à cible unique, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} contre chaque cible de la zone concernée sont effectués séparément. Les attaques de zone infligent des dégâts à toutes les cibles de la zone affectée, qu'il s'agisse d'alliés ou d'ennemis.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}的成功率为（20+（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}+招架{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}-（攻击者的武器技能+{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}））%。如果攻击者或目标身边还有其他手持近战武器的盟友或敌人，则会触发{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}效果，具体规则为： 1）每个在目标身边，手持近战武器的盟友，都会让攻击者武器技能+10。 2）每个在攻击者身边，手持近战武器的敌人，都会让目标武器技能+10。 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的基础几率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。如果目标未能闪避或招架攻击，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 近战武器的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}与单个目标的攻击方式相似，但目标区域内的所有目标都需要单独进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。范围攻击会对攻击目标区域内的所有目标造成伤害，不分敌我。
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}的成功率为（20+（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}+招架{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}-（攻击者的武器技能+{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}））%。如果攻击者或目标身边还有其他手持近战武器的盟友或敌人，则会触发{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}效果，具体规则为： 1）每个在目标身边，手持近战武器的盟友，都会让攻击者武器技能+10。 2）每个在攻击者身边，手持近战武器的敌人，都会让目标武器技能+10。 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的基础几率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。如果目标未能闪避或招架攻击，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 近战武器的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}与单个目标的攻击方式相似，但目标区域内的所有目标都需要单独进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。范围攻击会对攻击目标区域内的所有目标造成伤害，不分敌我。

languages.text: La probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} un ataque es (20 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del objetivo + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a parada − (Habilidad de armas + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} del atacante)) %. Si un aliado con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo está cerca del objetivo o del atacante, se activa la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}superioridad en cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, que otorga: 1) +10 a la Habilidad de armas del atacante por cada aliado con arma cuerpo a cuerpo cerca del objetivo. 2) +10 a la Habilidad de armas del objetivo por cada aliado con arma cuerpo a cuerpo junto al atacante. La probabilidad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} un ataque de estas características es del (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva del atacante{/g}) %. La probabilidad total de esquiva puede variar en función de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y efectos que proporcionan bonificaciones o penalizaciones a la esquiva del objetivo o la reducción de esquiva del atacante. Si el objetivo no logra esquivar o parar el ataque, sufrirá {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo se efectúan igual que los de un objetivo, solo que las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} se hacen por separado contra cada objetivo en la zona afectada. Todos los objetivos en el área de efecto, aliados y enemigos, reciben el daño de estos ataques.
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: La probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} un ataque es (2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del objetivo + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a parada − ({g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de armas + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} del atacante))) %. Si un aliado con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo está cerca del objetivo o del atacante, se activa la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}superioridad en cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, que otorga: 1) +10 a la Habilidad de armas del atacante por cada aliado con arma cuerpo a cuerpo cerca del objetivo. 2) +10 a la Habilidad de armas del objetivo por cada aliado con arma cuerpo a cuerpo junto al atacante. La probabilidad base de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} este ataque es (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del atacante) %. Este valor también puede verse modificado por {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y efectos que influyan en la probabilidad de esquiva y por el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del arma utilizada. Si el objetivo no consigue esquivar ni parar el ataque, recibe daño. Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo se efectúan igual que los de un objetivo, solo que las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} se hacen por separado contra cada objetivo en la zona afectada. Todos los objetivos en el área de efecto, aliados y enemigos, reciben el daño de estos ataques.

languages.original_text: The chance to successfully parry is (2 × (target's Weapon Skill + parry bonuses − (attacker's Weapon Skill + parry reduction)))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, melee superiority is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to dodge such an attack is (10 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception})%. This value can also change depending on abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and also depends on the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} parameter of the weapon used. The target takes damage if it fails to dodge or parry the attack. Melee area attacks are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but tests against each target in the affected area are made separately. Area attack damage is taken by all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の成功率は（20 + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g} + 受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} — （アタッカーの近接攻撃 + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}））%。ターゲットの近くか攻撃しているキャラクターの近くに近接武器を持った味方がいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接優位{/g}が発動し、以下の効果を発揮する： 1）ターゲットの近くにいる近接武器を所持している味方ごとにアタッカーの近接攻撃＋10 2）アタッカーの隣にいる近接武器を所持している味方ごとにターゲットの近接攻撃＋10 このような攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する基本確率は（30 + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g} — アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}）%となる。合計回避率は。合計回避率はさらにボーナスを与える{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や効果、およびターゲットの回避ペナルティやアタッカーの回避減少の影響も受ける。攻撃の回避や受け流しに失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。 近接{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は単体攻撃と同じく行うが、範囲内の各ターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}は個別に行われる。範囲攻撃によるダメージは、敵味方問わず、範囲内の全ターゲットに与えられる。
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の成功率は（20 + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g} + 受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} — （アタッカーの武器スキル + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}））%。ターゲットの近くか攻撃しているキャラクターの近くに近接武器を持った味方がいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接優位{/g}が発動し、以下の効果を発揮する： 1）ターゲットの近くにいる近接武器を所持している味方ごとにアタッカーの武器スキル＋10 2）アタッカーの隣にいる近接武器を所持している味方ごとにターゲットの武器スキル＋10 このような攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する基本確率は（30 + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g} — アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}）%となる。合計回避率は。合計回避率はさらにボーナスを与える{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や効果、およびターゲットの回避ペナルティやアタッカーの回避減少の影響も受ける。攻撃の回避や受け流しに失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。 近接{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は単体攻撃と同じく行うが、範囲内の各ターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}は個別に行われる。範囲攻撃によるダメージは、敵味方問わず、範囲内の全ターゲットに与えられる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Savuşturma{/g} olasılığı, %(20 + hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} + savuşturma {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusları{/g} − (saldırganın Silah Yeteneği + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g})) formülüne eşittir. Yakın dövüş silahına sahip bir dost birim, hedefin veya saldıran karakterin yakınındaysa {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}yakın dövüş üstünlüğü{/g} etkinleşir. Bu da şunları kazandırır: 1) Yakın dövüş silahı olan, hedefin yakınındaki her dost birim için saldırganın Silah Yeteneği'ne +10 2) Yakın dövüş silahı olan, saldırganın yakınındaki her dost birim için hedefin Silah Yeteneği'ne +10. Böyle bir saldırıdan taban {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} olasılığı, %(30 + hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği − saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}) formülüne eşittir. Toplam kaçınma olasılığı, hedefin kaçınmasına veya saldırganın kaçınma azaltımına bonus veya ceza puanı veren {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve etkilerle daha da değişikliğe uğrayabilir. Hedef, saldırıdan kaçınmayı veya saldırıyı savuşturmayı başaramazsa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır. Yakın dövüş {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, tek hedefli saldırılarla aynı şekilde yapılır ama etkilenen alandaki tüm hedeflere karşı {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testler{/g} ayrı ayrı gerçekleştirilir. İster düşman olsun isterse de dost birim, etkilenen alanda bulunan tüm hedefler alan saldırısından hasar alır.
languages.original_text: The chance to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is (20 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%. If an ally with a melee weapon is near the target or the attacking character, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} is activated, which gives: 1) +10 to attacker's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon near the target 2) +10 to target's Weapon Skill for each ally with a melee weapon next to the attacker. The base chance to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} such an attack is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant bonuses or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to dodge or parry the attack. Melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} are made in the same way as single-target attacks, but {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against each target in the affected area are made separately. Damage from area attacks is inflicted on all targets in the affected area, both allies and enemies.
